text: Ara abasya'i purbe tomadera kache i'usupha esechilena spasta pramanadisaha; atahpara tini tomadera kache ya niye esechilena tomara tate sarbada sandeha karechile. Parisese yakhana tara mrtyu hala takhana tomara balechile, ‘tara pare allah‌ ara kono rasula prerana karabena na.' Ebhabe'i allah ye simalanghanakari, sansayabadi take bibhraanta karena
